nodes.text: Kinyov was a sparsely populated and largely desert province on the Lorrdian homeworld of Lorrd. During the opening stages of the Kanz Disorders, Lorrdian refugees fleeing from other more populated parts of the planet fled to Kinyov. However, they were rounded up by Argazdan Redoubt forces and enslaved. Its capital Qatamer became the headquarters of the Myrialite military occupation and slaving operations.
